import "./addProduct.css" import 'bootstrap'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faClock, faFaceAngry } from '@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons'; import { faL, faUser, faXmark } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; function AddProduct(){ // statusPressAddProduct = true thì hiện nút thêm sản phẩm const [statusPressAddProduct, setStatusPressAddProduct] = useState(true); const [infoAddNewProduct, setInfoAddNewProduct] = useState({ nameProduct: '', originPrice: '', sellPrice: '', typeProduct: '', desctiption: '', checkboxColor: [], checkboxSize: [], }); const handleInputInfoAddNewProduct = (e) => { e.persist(); setInfoAddNewProduct({...infoAddNewProduct, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}); } const handleInputInfoAddNewProduct_checkbox = (e) => { e.persist(); var name = e.target.name; var value = e.target.value; if(infoAddNewProduct[name].includes(value)){ setInfoAddNewProduct(infoAddNewProduct[name].filter(item => item !== value)); } else{ setInfoAddNewProduct({...infoAddNewProduct, [name]: [...infoAddNewProduct[name], value]}) } console.log(infoAddNewProduct); } const handleClickAddProduct = () => { setStatusPressAddProduct(!statusPressAddProduct); } return (
